resources:
Bisq SETUP Next LEARN MORE SHOW NOTIFICATIONS OK Send email with Bisq Phone ID Settings FACTORY RESETxc
Bisq is an open-source desktop application that allows you to buy and sell bitcoins in exchange for national currencies, or alternative crypto currencies. Do you want to use your computer's webcam or do you want to send an email to yourself? Now you can receive notifications about your Bisq trades. Register your phone with Bisq Please copy this Bisq Phone ID string into the field "Bisq Phone ID" in the Bisq App:

 

The Bisq Phone ID contains (1) your excryption key (AES/CBC/NOPadding with initialization vector) which is used by Bisq to encrypt the notifications for you and (2) a token from Apple that identifies this instance of the Bisq remote app. Bisq notifications Send the email to yourself.

Then go to your computer and open the Bisq App.

Open Account -> Notifications

Then open the email and paste the Bisq Phone ID into the Bisq. 

Your phone will automatically receive a confirmation notification. Go to your computer and open the Bisq App.

Open Account -> Notifications

Then press "Scan QR code".

Your phone will automatically receive a confirmation notification. Congratulations, you are all set.
INSTRUCTIONS RESEND EMAIL
